tool_description: Scrape data while skipping Xpath/class—simply tell us your data needs in natural language, we'll extract it.
name: AI Powered Fast Data Scraping
title: AI Powered Fast Data Scraping

api_list.name: Data Extraction With Proxies
api_list.description: This is the same endpoint as the regular /extract, but it uses unique residential proxies for each request in the country of your choosing.

api_list.name: Extract Data
api_list.description: /extract is the primary endpoin. This endpoint accepts a URL along with one or more parameters that you wish to extract from the website. To ensure optimal results, separate multiple parameters with commas and use highly descriptive terms. For instance, instead of inputting 'Color', use 'product_main_color' to obtain a more accurate representation of the product color. Feel free to experiment with various parameter prompts to achieve the desired outcome.
